name: Gooblith & Burnie by Team Get Goo'd
name_original: Gooblith & Burnie by Team Get Goo'd
description:
Gooblith & Burnie is a top down puzzle co-op horror. You and your friend are playing as two mutated monsters inside a secret underground lab facility and your mission is to escape it. Burnie & Gooblith is all about teamwork. The two monsters have different abilities which only work if you work together as a team. 

Test your teamwork skills with a friend, escape and take over the world!! (or some cliche bullshit)  

We wanted to create a game for two players to collaborate in solving puzzles while also making it spooky.  Nothing is more powerful than friendship, except being really really scared. Let the collaboration begin!

Made by 

Character Artist - Freja Hammar

Technical Designer - Stephen Glenister

Level Artist - Astradur "Ace" Larusson

Mentor - Dennis Jensen

Additional assets used

Free Sci-Fi Office Pack by Terresquall
